revised_title: Life and Scientific Contributions of Frederick Alexander Lindemann, Viscount Cherwell
tldr: The article is a biography of Frederick Alexander Lindemann, Viscount Cherwell, who made significant contributions to various fields of physics, including low-temperature physics, thermodynamics, and quantum theory. He also worked on astronomical and geophysical problems. Lindemann's scientific work was done between 1910 and 1924, and he was a stimulating conversationalist and a versatile thinker who brought together ideas from different branches of physics in his research.
